snippet: LEAD: A Federal appeals court has ordered a speedup in the handling of the case of Robert Alton Harris, a convicted murderer whose stay of execution was backed by the Supreme Court on Monday....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: A Federal appeals court has ordered a speedup in the handling of the case of Robert Alton Harris, a convicted murderer whose stay of execution was backed by the Supreme Court on Monday.

headline.main: SPEEDUP ORDERED IN DEATH ROW CASE
